1.name: Recharge Chamber

desc.1: Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.

1.flavor: Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace's gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

2.name: Lightning Piercer
2.desc: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the target's <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</ct> is reduced by 8.5%, and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup RES</ct> is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.

flavor.0: "Dissecting" complex mechanical structures is Grace's greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.
flavor.1: How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

3.name: Chief Mechanic
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Grace was personally involved in writing the "Belobog Industries' Construction Safety Guidelines."
flavor.1: She's also the employee who violated the "no dangerous explosives at construction sites" policy the most times.

4.name: Burst Capacitor
4.desc: When Grace uses her <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Quick Inspection</ct> hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.

flavor.0: Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the "Electropulse Recycling Module," there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.
flavor.1: "Can you equip my bro with one too?"

5.flavor: The "Frosty Cold Iron Witch" is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that's what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.
